actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating the week beginning on July 4, 1981, as "National Unity Week".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the week beginning July 4, 1981, and such week of each year thereafter, as "National Unity Week."

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating the week beginning on July 4, 1981, as "National Unity Week".
